about_the_game:
Missing Meows is a beautifully hand-drawn puzzle adventure set in Karlsberg, a fictional town located in the northern reaches of Bohemia. Step into the shoes of Soph, a university student returning to her quaint hometown to find her missing childhood cat, Princess.

Although the task seems daunting, Soph isn’t an ordinary girl — she has understood the language of cats since childhood. Who better to help her locate Princess? In return, she can offer them refuge from the approaching winter.

But can she save her beloved cat in time?

Finding Princess is no easy task. You’ll need to tackle numerous riddles and mysteries on your journey to discover where your cat has wandered off. Use your map and visit various locations in the town, retracing the final sightings of your cat and discovering its secrets, and maybe hang some "Missing cat" posters.

As you explore, you will encounter other lost pets and strays. Assist them in finding shelter or a new home, but remember — cats are fickle creatures. They each have their own personality, attitude, and past. Earning their loyalty won’t be easy, as cats have their own magical world and mystical powers. For every cat, you will have a puzzle to solve, through which you get to know each other and form a valuable bond.

Meet other people from your childhood town, whether they be old friends, strangers, or even enemies — and see how the town has changed since you left.

The game is currently in development, join the Discord for further updates and cute cat photos!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz

name: Missing Meows

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some

short_description: Your beloved childhood cat has vanished. Return home and find her, but hurry up - the howling wind foretells an early, unforgiving winter. Explore your hometown, talk to other strays, and solve puzzles in their magical worlds to figure out where your friend has gone.
